price: Ngaho nibazane inkuru zimeze nk’iziyivugwamo (Qur’an), niba koko ari abanyakuri.
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
